sindo

Class Conf

  • java.lang.Object
    • sindo.Conf

  • public class Conf
extends java.lang.Object
    VSCF configuration
    o nCUP : the number of modes excited o mm[nCUP] : the excited modes o vv[nCUP] : the quantum numbers of the modes
    Since:
    Sindo 3.4
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kiyoshi Yagi

        Construct VSCF configuration
        Parameters:
        nCUP - the number of modes excited
        mm - the excited modes
        vv - the quantum numbers of the modes

      • Conf

        public Conf(java.lang.String vscf_conf)
        Construct VSCF configuration from one line data
        Parameters:
        vscf_conf - The data separated with space: "nCUP mm1 mm2 .. mm(nCUP) vv1 vv2 ... vv(nCUP)"
